alert.note: Alert for Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 3:55PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Throckmorton County through 445 PM CDT... At 355 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elbert, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Throckmorton, Woodson, Elbert, The Intersection Of Us-183 And Us- 283, The Intersection Of Us-283 And Ranch Road 209 and Lusk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
